main event: A UFO was sighted in Dayton, Ohio on May 14 and 15, 1964, showing erratic motion and changing brightness.
interesting points: The UFO was described as being as bright as Venus,Some witnesses reported it changing brightness and shape,It was recorded to have disappeared below the horizon,The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes,Multiple witnesses, including children, were noted during this observation.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
